name: nude-artist-management.com
description: Website based on express and Vue.js for Nude Artist Management.

scripts.build-website-container: docker build -t eu.gcr.io/cluster-01-1252/plus-website:latest -t eu.gcr.io/cluster-01-1252/plus-website:$TAG -f cluster/container/Dockerfile-Website . && gcloud docker push eu.gcr.io/cluster-01-1252/plus-website:latest && gcloud docker push eu.gcr.io/cluster-01-1252/plus-website:$TAG

author: Robert Jefe Lindstaedt <robert.lindstaedt@gmail.com>
